component.name: Apple Music
component.summary: Access the Apple Music web service on Linux

description.p: Provides native desktop integration for the Apple Music and Classical web services. It launches in a dedicated Chrome or Chromium window in App mode (no address bar) for a clean, native-like experience.

ul.li: Individual launchers for Music and Classical apps
Clean app-like interface with no browser UI elements
Persistent login with support for Face ID by using a passkey
Native desktop integration with proper icon and application category

description.p: Note: This is an unofficial third-party application not affiliated with Apple Inc. Apple Music is a trademark of Apple Inc. Icons by The Cross-Platform Organization (https://github.com/cross-platform) and Apple.

screenshot.caption: Music app pinned to Task Manager
Classical app pinned to Task Manager

ul.li: Independent icons foe each app (Music and Classical)
Architectures: amd64 (most PCs) and arm64 (Apple Silicon with Asahi Linux, Raspberry Pi)
